objects.description:
Monitor for new constructed windows registry keys that may create or modify Windows services to repeatedly execute malicious payloads as part of persistence.

Implementation 1 : Creation of the HKLM\System\CurrentControlSet\Services Registry key

Detection Pseudocode
suspicious_processes = filter ProcessGuid, ProcessFilePath, RegistryKeyPath, UserName where event_id == "12" AND RegistryKeyPath LIKE '%HKLM\System\CurrentControlSet\Services\%'

Detection Notes

- For Windows Sysmon event id 12, installation of application with configuration file is required. - For Windows Sysmon event id 12, addition of CreateKey and DeleteKey events in config file is required.
